nodes.bodyText: Notice JettyHandler didn't seem to have implemented counting, so thought it'd be a quick fix to add it, but some conflict between unnamed classloader and app classloader here :( Tomorrow will give another small look and then revert this and remove the assertion for now.
Found it was because I was missing this advice from the helper classes (was referring to servlet-3.0 while writing this). Filed #796 since this was confusing.
